snippet.title: Graces Posthumous wish Demo Trailer
snippet.description:
Visual Novel "Graces: Posthumous wish"
▽△▽
Day after day, Aki suffers from constant misfortunes. Her classmate Mitsuki is convinced that all the trouble is caused by a curse. And she knows how to stop it. However, Aki doesn't get a chance to ask her for details: Mitsuki mysteriously dies.

Rumor has her death is the fault of some girl. In an attempt to understand what has happened, Aki decides to perform a dark ritual called "Posthumous wish", which might help her solve the mystery of Mitsuki's death and find a way to break the curse.

Meanwhile, the entire town is already entangled with the vines of a strange plant.
▽△▽
OUR NOVELS:
STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/curator/44975977
VKPlay: https://vkplay.ru/play/developer/tomotoro/
